H0.text: Keeping the result is the action that Hector should most likely perform when he counts a different number of ducks in the pond than the rest of the class.

H1.text: Hector should change the number he counted when he counted a different number of ducks in the pond than the rest of his class.

H2.text: He should think that the class results are wrong, because Hector counted a different number of ducks in the pond than the rest of his classmates.

H3.text: Remove his number from the class result is the action Hector should most likely perform because he counted a different number of ducks in the pond than the rest of his class.
